segments.text: To think of it ! All my old silver ! It meant so much to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And my new car . To think that he simply drove off with everything in my car . That's what hurts me most .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's so terrible too , is the fools we've made of ourselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hardly dare call the police . They'll just laugh at us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll never get over it . Oh , Harry , it was all so unnecessary . That man ! ! How could he do this to us after we'd put him up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And his story didn't even hold together . I feel such an idiot .
segments.speaker: S2
